title: what about this specific use case?
content:
what about this specific use case?

\> [http://rji.missouri.edu/technology-journalism/digital-newsbook.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040134/http:/rji.missouri.edu/technology-journalism/digital-newsbook.php "http://rji.missouri.edu/technology-journalism/digital-newsbook.php")

they ask that any "custom fonts" be provided.

what would the average font eula have to say about this?

-bowerbird
author: bowerbird

comments.content: Almost all EULAs do not allow you to give your fonts to the press.
